definitions: The act or process of picking up.
A small truck with an open back for carrying goods.
A person or thing that is picked up, especially a casual acquaintance or date.
The ability of a vehicle to accelerate quickly.
examples: The pick up of the package was delayed.
There's been a pick up in sales.
He drove a pick up truck.
She was just a pick up from the bar.
This car has good pick up.
